content:
I'm happy to help you with the weather forecast! However, I'm a large language model, I don't have real-time access to your location or current weather conditions. But I can suggest some options to help you check the weather:

1. Check online weather websites: You can visit websites like weather.com, accuweather.com, or wunderground.com to check the current weather and forecast for your area.
2. Use a weather app: You can download a weather app on your smartphone, such as Dark Sky or Weather Underground, to get real-time weather updates and forecasts.
3. Tune into local news: You can watch local news or check their website to get the latest weather forecast and updates.

As for Max's new leash, that's great to hear! It's always exciting to get new gear for your furry friend. A comfortable leash can make a big difference in your walks together. Enjoy your walk with Max, and I hope the weather cooperates!
